Package database

Class appointments_table

java.lang.Object
database.appointments_table
public class appointments_table extends Object
This class handles all the database queries and such regarding the Appointments table.
Author:
Zachary Hoppock

    • getAppointmentsSortByTypeAndMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<appointments> getAppointmentsSortByTypeAndMonth()
      This method runs a database query to pull all appointments and sort them by Type and then the month of the Start time.
      Returns:
      returns an ObservableList of appointments based on the given selection query

    • getAppointmentsSortByContactAndStart

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<appointments> getAppointmentsSortByContactAndStart()

      Returns:
      returns an ObservableList of appointments based on the given selection query

    • getAppointmentsSortByCustomerAndYear

      This method runs a database query to pull all appointments and sort them by Customer ID and then the year of the Start time.
      Returns:
      returns an ObservableList of appointments based on the given selection query

    • getAppointmentsWithContacts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<appointmentContact> getAppointmentsWithContacts()
      This method runs a database query to pull all appointments with specified columns and associated Contact name.
      Returns:
      returns an ObservableList of appointmentContacts based on the given selection query

    • addAppointment

      public static int addAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, Timestamp startTime, Timestamp endTime, Timestamp createDate, String createdBy, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerId, int userId, int contactId)
      This method runs a database query to add an appointment with specified details to its respective table in the database.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the appointment
      description - a description of the appointment
      location - the location of the appointment
      type - the type of appointment
      startTime - the starting date and time of the appointment
      endTime - the ending date and time of the appointment
      createDate - the date and time the appointment was created
      createdBy - the user who created the appointment
      lastUpdate - the date and time the appointment was last updated
      lastUpdatedBy - the user who last updated the appointment
      customerId - the ID of the customer associated with the appointment
      userId - the ID of the user associated with the appointment
      contactId - the ID of the contact associated with the appointment
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected in the query update, used to confirm if the appointment was added or not

    • deleteAppointment

      public static int deleteAppointment(int appointmentId)
      This method runs a database query to delete a selected appointment from its respective table in the database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment selected for deletion
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected in the query update, used to confirm if the appointment was deleted or not

    • getAppointmentCustomerId

      public static int getAppointmentCustomerId(int selectCustomerId)
      This method runs a database query to take the Customer ID of a customer from the Customers table and returns its associated Customer ID from the Appointments table. This is used in the Customers screen to assist when deleting Customers to show if they have appointments or not.
      Parameters:
      selectCustomerId - the Customer ID from a Customers Table entry
      Returns:
      the Customer ID from an Appointments Table entry

    • getSelectedAppointment

      public static appointmentContact getSelectedAppointment()
      This method takes a selected appointment (with contact name) from the Appointments screen and takes it and its details to the Update Appointments screen.
      Returns:
      the selected appointmentContact from the Appointments screen

    • updateAppointment

      public static int updateAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, Timestamp startTime, Timestamp endTime, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerId, int userId, int contactId, int appointmentId)
      This method runs a database query to update a selected appointment with specified details to its respective table in the database.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the appointment
      description - a description of the appointment
      location - the location of the appointment
      type - the type of appointment
      startTime - the starting date and time of the appointment
      endTime - the ending date and time of the appointment
      lastUpdate - the date and time the appointment was last updated
      lastUpdatedBy - the user who last updated the appointment
      customerId - the ID of the customer associated with the appointment
      userId - the ID of the user associated with the appointment
      contactId - the ID of the contact associated with the appointment
      appointmentId - the ID of the selected Appointment to be updated
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected in the query update, used to confirm if the appointment was updated or not

    • getAppointmentsByCustomer

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<appointments> getAppointmentsByCustomer(int selectedCustomerId)
      This method runs a database query to pull up a list of appointment for a specified customer.
      Parameters:
      selectedCustomerId - the ID of the Customer associated with the appointment
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of appointments for the specified customer

    • getAppointmentsByUser

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<appointments> getAppointmentsByUser(int selectedUserId)
      This method runs a database query to pull up a list of appointment for a specified user.
      Parameters:
      selectedUserId - the ID of the user to check appointments for
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of appointments for the specified user

    • getAppointmentTypes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<appointments> getAppointmentTypes(String selectedType)
      This method runs a database query to pull up a list of appointments with a specific type.
      Parameters:
      selectedType - the type of appointment to be queried for
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of a specific appointment type.

    • grabAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<appointments> grabAppointments(PreparedStatement ps)
      This method is used by certain other methods of this class to pull up a list of appointments based of a specified query.
      Parameters:
      ps - the prepared statement to execute the query with
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of appointments specified by the prepared statement
